headline: What Analysts Think Gives Telekom Indonesia (IDX:TLKM) A New Edge As The Story Shifts
summary: The fair value estimate for Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia has been revised slightly, with a new target of IDR 3,887.27, while the discount rate and revenue growth assumption have been adjusted to reflect a more measured balance between risk and top line expectations. Behind this, analysts are weighing the potential impact of the planned infrastructure spinoff and streamlining plans against the execution risks and the possibility that some of the capital unlock...
